name: EARTH ISLAND INSTITUTE
description: Earth Island Institute is an environmental organization.
sampleDescriptions: 2023 Farm Bill, including HR 4327, which would establish an alternative manure management program at USDA.
The 2023 Farm Bill, including the COWS Act (H.R. 4327). HR 4327 which would establish an alternative manure management program at USDA. The Senate version was introduced in July, bill number TBD.
The 2023 Farm Bill, including the COWS Act (H.R. 4327 and S. 2479). HR 4327 and its Senate companion measure, S. 2479, would establish an alternative manure management program at USDA.
